name: Idle Fishing Story
description:
Ahoy, Cap’n! It’s time to assemble your fleet and set sail across the vast blue oceans. There are plenty of fish in the sea, and your goal is to net fish from all over the world in this addicting strategic idle fishing game.
Recruit new captains and expand your fleet often to increase your haul. Like a shark, you’ll have to keep moving forward to survive in this game.
Upgrade your vessels and send them to new locations every week. Collect pearls and coins to level up and unlock the mysteries of the briny depths.

Drop anchor and download Idle Fishing Story today!


FEATURES
● Sail to new and unique fishing spots every week.
● Collect captain and boat cards, pearls, and coins to complete challenges and earn rewards.
● Unlock boats like “The Slammin’ Salmon,” “The Codfather,” and “Uni Dos Tres” to expand your
● Plunder chests to boost your profits and find rare
● Hire captains to man the deck while you’re away.
● Upgrade your ships and train your captains, then watch your profits rise with the tides!
● Check in daily for free rewards.
